# Scalding Touch (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** Up to one creature/level touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Magic of Eberron (Wotc), pg. 100

Your hand ignites with the white-hot fury of the sun, dealing 13d6 points of fire damage with a successful melee touch attack. Touched creatures are also [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round by the burning pain unless they make a successful Fortitude saving throw. You can use this melee touch attack up to once per caster level.
